ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's response to a very well thought out post
ygData.msgSnippet: My point was if you are a bard you have to know people.  If you are an enchanter or cleric or several of the other we gotta have that classes you don t need
ygData.messageBody:
My point was if you are a bard you have to know people. If you are an
enchanter or cleric or several of the other "we gotta have that" classes you
don't need to know anybody cause everyone wants you in their group.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2000 12:11 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's response to a very well thought out post



At 07:43 PM 9/14/00 +0200, you wrote:
>
>
>I am just talking about the class i, itself ;)
>
>Even a necro with full of friend will be able to find a group quickly :)))

that's my point. with the current crowding on servers, it's more important
who
you know and who your friends are than what your class is.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
